title: Slate's Spoiler Specials: Hot Tub Time Machine
description:
Slate's Dana Stevens, John Swansburg and Dan Kois discuss Hot Tub Time Machine.  WARNING: This podcast is meant to be heard AFTER you've seen the movie.
